text:
On account of Kaanum Pongal, thousands of people thronged tourist spots in Kanyakumari district on Sunday.

Important spots such as Triveni Sangamam, Gandhi Mandapam, Sunrise point and Sunset point, Vivekanandar Rock, Tiruvalluvar statue had attracted a large number of tourists.

People also thronged Padmanabhapuram Palace, Mathur Hanging bridge, Thirparappu waterfalls, Sitharal hill temple and beaches in Chothavilai and Sanguthurai.
title: Thousands throng tourist spots
